General.Name: MagIndustries Corp
General.Description: MagIndustries Corp. engages in mineral and forestry businesses in Canada. It explores for and develops potash salt deposits; and operates eucalyptus plantation and chip mills. The company was formerly known as Magnesium Alloy Corporation and changed its name to MagIndustries Corp. in January 2005. MagIndustries Corp. is based in Toronto, Canada. MagIndustries Corp. is a subsidiary of Evergreen Resources Holding (BVI) Ltd.
General.Address: 33 Yonge Street, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5E 1G4
